Package fr.upem.net.tcp.nonblocking

Class ChatHack

java.lang.Object
fr.upem.net.tcp.nonblocking.ChatHack
public class ChatHack
extends java.lang.Object

The ChatHack will let a client communicate with a server and other clients.

Author:
LOPES MENDES Ailton, LAMBERT--DELAVAQUERIE Fabien

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static ChatHack create​(java.nio.file.Path path, java.lang.String hostname, int port, java.lang.String login, java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> password)
    Factory to create ChatHack, it will also attribute a free random port number to identify our client.
    void launch()
    Will launch the client and allow it to exchange with the server and other clients.
    static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
    Will take up to 4 or 5 arguments in following order.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • create

      public static ChatHack create​(java.nio.file.Path path, java.lang.String hostname, int port, java.lang.String login, java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> password) throws java.io.IOException

      Factory to create ChatHack, it will also attribute a free random port number to identify our client.

      The path will determine the directory in which there will be the files our client wants acess to echange.
      The hostname and port are use to link the client to a server.
      The login and password are used to identify a client but also allow the client to connect with the server.
      Parameters:
      path - a Path
      hostname - a String
      port - a int.
      login - a String
      password - a Optional of String.
      Returns:
      ChatHack
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - a IOException.

    • launch

      public void launch() throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.InterruptedException

      Will launch the client and allow it to exchange with the server and other clients.

      Will start another thread to get typing information and send Frame respectively.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - a IOException.
      java.lang.InterruptedException - a InterruptedException.

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args) throws java.lang.NumberFormatException, java.io.IOException, java.lang.InterruptedException

      Will take up to 4 or 5 arguments in following order.

      • a valid path to a directory
      • the host of the server
      • the server port
      • the client login
      • password not necessary in some cases
      Parameters:
      args - a array of String
      Throws:
      java.lang.NumberFormatException - a NumberFormatException
      java.io.IOException - a IOException
      java.lang.InterruptedException - a InterruptedException
